snippet: The Knicks will have until Tuesday to match the three-year, $25 million offer sheet that Jeremy Lin signed with the Houston Rockets.
abstract: New York Knicks have until July 17 at midnight to match the three-year, $25 million offer sheet that Jeremy Lin signed with the Houston Rockets.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks will have until Tuesday to match the three-year, $25 million offer sheet that Jeremy Lin signed with the Houston Rockets.

headline.seo: Jeremy Lin Signs Offer Sheet; Knicks Have Time to React
headline.main: Lin Signs Offer Sheet With Rockets, but Knicks Have Time to React
headline.print_headline: Lin Signs Offer Sheet With Rockets, but Knicks Have Time to React
